Title: Relates to establishing the COVID-19 childcare provider reimbursement program
Summary: Establishes the COVID-19 childcare provider reimbursement program in order to incentivize providers to re-open or expand current childcare programs; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing the COVID-19 childcare provider reimbursement program; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
